name: Snake Shooter
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2018

Snake Game where the snake does not eat the 'collectibles' but instead tries to get shorter by ricocheting a projectile and destroying the body.Do not hit the head.

Bonus points by ricocheting the projectile off the 'collectible' and then hitting the body.

Higher the round the longer the snake and less time between 'collectibles' spawning.
